pages.title: Miller-Urey Capsule
pages.text: TODO This page is a placeholder for a feature which is still being developed.$(br2)Summary: Creates an embryo from a centrifuged blood sample and various ingredients. Add items with a syringe in the mainhand and the ingredient in the offhand. Add the blood first,
then modifiers. Potions for effects, nametag for imprinting, soul for respawning.$(br2)A charge beam finalizes the crafting. Support for circuits and dispensers.$(br2)
